comments.content:
I am now popping a Droste 72% pastille in honor of your (plural) kindness.   
   
Yves, you're too nice to me... except in making me note how young and healthy that mountain lion looks compared to me! :-)   
   
hhp

Happy Bithday Hrant, may you continue to add diversity to an increasingly monotonous dominant culture for many years to come. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125039im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Happy birthday, Hrant!   
   
But this dark chocolate madness \*must\* be stopped!The entire American corporate culture is oriented to produce milk chocolate. If the US lets people eat whatever kind of chocolate they like, there'll be anarchy! Not to mention lower corporate profits.   
   
Time to plant some rumors about WMDs at Bernard Callebaut's shop....   
   
T

Happy Birthday, Hrant.   
   
May your favorite glyph be cast in dark chocolate.
Happy birthday Hrant! I suppose you think this means I'll let you off the hook for not ranting about legibility earlier...
